title: BRIEF-BHP Shareholders Look Set To Reject Resolution On Suspension Of Membership Of Industry Associations
text:
BRIEF-BHP Shareholders Look Set To Reject Resolution On Suspension Of Membership Of Industry Associations

Stock Markets 27 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 01:07)

© Reuters. BRIEF-BHP Shareholders Look Set To Reject Resolution On Suspension Of Membership Of Industry Associations Oct 17 (Reuters) - BHP Group Ltd : * SHAREHOLDERS LOOK SET TO REJECT A RESOLUTION THAT BHP SUSPEND MEMBERSHIP OF INDUSTRY ASSOCIATIONS – LONDON AGM * BHP'S AUSTRALIAN SHAREHOLDERS, WHO ACCOUNT FOR 58% OF SHARES, WILL HOLD A SEPARATE VOTE AT ANOTHER AGM IN SYDNEY ON NOV. 7 – LONDON AGM * 22.16% OF UK PROXY VOTERS VOTED FOR MOTION ON BHP'S MEMBERSHIP OF INDUSTRY ASSOCIATIONS , ACCORDING TO PROXY VOTES - LONDON AGM Further company coverage: BHP.AX

BRIEF-BHP Shareholders Look Set To Reject Resolution On Suspension Of Membership Of Industry Associations
description: BRIEF-BHP Shareholders Look Set To Reject Resolution On Suspension Of Membership Of Industry Associations
